name: Unroll impossible colors
description:
Do you like Rubiks Cube and want to have one in your pocket? Then this game is for you.
Just swipe the color tiles to move Up/Down and Left/right to match the same colored tiles.
Simple, but fun!

** FEATURES **
• Simple user interface, simple controls
• Endless challenge
• Easy to play, hard to master
• Simple and colorful design
• Beautiful music and sounds
• Share your color with friends
• Unlimited Color Themes
